Package converter

Class Entities

java.lang.Object
converter.Entities
class Entities extends Object
Container class grouping all extracted entities by their type AND including the collection information for the final JSON output structure. MODIFIED: Removed the 'Artifacts' list and updated the constructor.

  • Constructor Details

    • Entities

      public Entities(Set<Item> itemsSet, Set<Document> documentsSet, Set<Person> peopleSet, Set<Organization> organizationsSet, Set<Category> categoriesSet, Set<Material> materialsSet)
      MODIFIED Constructor for Entities object. Removed artifactsSet parameter. Converts Sets of unique entities into Lists suitable for JSON serialization.
      Parameters:
      itemsSet - Set of unique Item entities.
      documentsSet - Set of unique Document entities.
      peopleSet - Set of unique Person entities.
      organizationsSet - Set of unique Organization entities.
      categoriesSet - Set of unique Category entities.
      materialsSet - Set of unique Material entities.
